eclipse.controller.util

Class JTextPaneAppender

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.log4j.AppenderSkeleton
      • eclipse.controller.util.JTextPaneAppender
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.apache.log4j.Appender, org.apache.log4j.spi.OptionHandler

    public class JTextPaneAppender
extends org.apache.log4j.AppenderSkeleton
    Implements a log4j appender which writes to a swing JTextPane This code was copied from "jakarta-log4j-1.2.15\apache-log4j-1.2.15\contribs\SvenReimers\gui\TextPaneAppender.java " (which did not work properly, not even compile) and adapted for my needs. added a 'maxLines' constructor parameter that defines the maximum numbers of lines allowed truncating what's old (FIFO)
    Author:
    bender
